summary: CVT TRANSMISSION AND COOLER - VEHICLE RANDOMLY DROPS ACCELERATION.  WHEN ACCELERATION DROPS, THE CAR WILL NOT GO ABOVE 40MPH EVEN IF YOU PUT THE PEDAL TO THE FLOOR, AND THE RPMS RISE TO 8.  NO RHYME OR REASON.  THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE WITH THIS TRANSMISSION.  NISSAN ONLY EXTENDED WARRANTY TO 2010 MODELS, YET THIS IS THE EXACT ISSUE COVERED UNDER THE EXTENDED WARRANTY.  THERE ARE MANY OTHER NISSAN OWNERS WITH 2011 MODELS WITH THE SAME EXACT ISSUE.
